animeTitle: Kaette Kita Top wo Nerae! Kagaku Kouza
animeDescription: Extra science lessons included with the Gunbuster Blu-ray Box Complete Edition. These explain how the space ropeway works, and time dilation from near-lightspeed travel.
animeRelated: ['Top wo Nerae! Gunbuster', 'Top wo Nerae! Kagaku Kouza']
